name: The Fertile Farm
description:
In celebration of Mayternity 2021 I made a short game called "The Fertile Farm". It is inspired mostly by Stardew Valley but features some things from various other pregnancy focused games. It has gone though some bug testing but there still may be some bugs in it. If there is game breaking ones, I'll look into putting in an update. 

Features:

-Farming/Gathering System

-Crafting System

-Cooking System

-Furniture Build System

-Pregnancy/Nutrition System (The more nutrition the larger the pregnancy)

-Contains Hyperpreg option

-Contains Breastfeeding option

-Optional birth scene (No nudity)
